Installation & Usage

Installation

No installation needed. Just fork the repo, install dev dependencies, and get running.

Development setup

There are a few dependencies and I want to thank @btford and the @NaturalNode Organization for their awesome tools which without them this wouldn‚Äôt be as easy.

Fork the repo, and add your own package.json file with:

npm init

and fill in all the gritty details.

The site uses Brian Ford‚Äôs write-good linter for native English and NaturalNode‚Äôs natural for the tokenizers in its Node npm module.

To install write-good:

npm install write-good

‚Ä¶and natural:

npm install natural
